tips.title: Digital Nomad Tips
items: Research visa requirements and tax implications for your target destinations
Join local nomad communities and co-working spaces to network and get insider tips
Always have reliable internet backup plans, including mobile hotspots and data plans
Factor in health insurance and emergency fund costs in your budget planning
Use local banking solutions and currency exchange apps to minimize fees
Book accommodation for the first week only, then explore better long-term options locally

nomadCalculator.tip3Description: Consider long-term stays as there are many discount benefits for stays of 3+ months.
